original_text: But you have turned aside from the way. You have caused many to stumble by your instruction. You have corrupted the covenant of Levi, says the Lord of hosts,
korean_text: 너희는 옳은 길에서 떠나 많은 사람을 율법에 거스르게 하는도다 나 만군의 여호와가 이르노니 너희가 레위의 언약을 깨뜨렸느니라

sentences.original_text: But you have turned aside from the way.
You have caused many to stumble by your instruction.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희의 가르침으로 많은 사람을 걸려 넘어지게 했다.
